original_text: The crowd joined in attacking them, and the magistrates tore the garments off them and gave orders to beat them with rods.
korean_text: 무리가 일제히 일어나 고발하니 상관들이 옷을 찢어 벗기고 매로 치라 하여

sentences.original_text: The crowd joined in attacking them
and the magistrates tore the garments off them
and gave orders to beat them with rods
